Cognitive Behavioral Therapy For many patients, cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) works as well as antidepressants in treating severe depression. Like all psychotherapies, much of the success depends on the skill of the therapist. Many studies suggest that combining cognitive therapy with antidepressants offer the greatest benefits. During light therapy, also known as phototherapy or heliotherapy, a patient sits near a light therapy box that gives off a bright artificial light meant to mimic natural outdoor light.
